results.description: Sassuolo's Francesco Magnanelli and Parma's Matteo Scozzarella are given one-match bans for blasphemy during Serie A matches.
results.shortTitle: Two Serie A players given blasphemy ban
results.title: Serie A blasphemy bans: Francesco Magnanelli & Matteo Scozzarella suspended

results.description: The European transfer deadline saw a number of Premier League fringe players depart - but were they discarded too soon?
results.shortTitle: Discarded early or just clearing the decks?
results.title: Premier League: Were these players discarded too soon?

thumbnail.altText: Fernando Llorente, Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Javier Hernandez

results.description: Manchester United defender Matteo Darmian joins Italian Serie A side Parma on a four-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Darmian leaves Man Utd to join Parma
results.title: Matteo Darmian: Manchester United defender joins Parma on four-year deal

results.description: Juventus captain Giorgio Chiellini scores the only goal of the game as his side open the Serie A season with victory over Parma.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo goal ruled out in Juve win
results.title: Parma 0-1 Juventus: Cristiano Ronaldo goal ruled out for offside as Giorgio Chiellini scores winner

results.description: Former Arsenal forward Gervinho scores twice as Parma come from 3-1 down to earn a point at Serie A leaders Juventus.
results.title: Juventus 3-3 Parma: Gervinho scores twice to stun Serie A leaders

results.description: A Serie B game is halted five seconds after kick-off and then abandoned following a head injury to Lecce midfielder Manuel Scavone.
results.shortTitle: Serie B game stopped after five seconds
results.title: Serie B game halted after five seconds and then abandoned after player suffers head injury

results.description: Inter Milan's poor start to the season continues as Federico Dimarco scores a brilliant winner for Parma against his parent club.
results.shortTitle: Inter beaten by goal from loanee
results.title: Inter Milan 0-1 Parma: Inter beaten by goal from own loanee Federico Dimarco

results.description: Mario Mandzukic and Blaise Matuidi give Juventus victory at Parma, with Cristiano Ronaldo still awaiting his first goal.
results.shortTitle: Juventus stay top with win over Parma
results.title: Parma 1-2 Juventus: Juventus stay top of Serie A thanks to entertaining win at Parma

results.description: Captain and defender Alessandro Lucarelli stood by Parma on their long road back to Serie A - here's his story.
results.shortTitle: Lucarelli - the man who kept Parma going
results.title: Alessandro Lucarelli: The Parma captain who kept the club going

results.description: Juventus and Cristiano Ronaldo travel to Parma while Real Madrid welcome Leganes to the Bernabeu - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo's wait for Juve goal goes on, Real Madrid ahead
results.title: Parma v Juventus & Real Madrid v Leganes live

results.description: Italian side Parma have signed Gervinho on a three-year contract after Hebei China Fortune agreed to release the former Arsenal forward.
results.shortTitle: Gervinho joins Serie A newcomers Parma
results.title: Gervinho: Parma sign Ivory Coast forward for Serie A return

results.description: Italian striker Emanuele Calaio is banned for two years for match-fixing while his club Parma are deducted five points.
results.title: Match-fixing: Parma striker Emanuele Calaio banned and club given points deduction
